availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmhand. North Carolina native. Son of John N. Dorr and Mary Dorr. Married to Nancy Ann Blalock Dorr in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on September 1, 1864. Student in Robeson County, North Carolina, in 1850. Farmhand in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, North Carolina, Robeson County, Southern Division, p. 360B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 81.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #001929335, p. 3.
"Valentine Dorr (1836-1912)," Find A Grave, Memorial #79516751, accessed June 9, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/79516751.
